articles.title: Power bill for just one month could soar to £500 in January after Russia cuts back Europe's supplies - Daily Mail
articles.description: Wholesale gas prices surged yesterday after Vladimir Putin's regime halved supplies to Europe through the Nord Stream 1 pipeline, in what Germany condemned as a 'duplicitous game'.
articles.content:
Energy bills could hit £500 for the month of January after Russia cut back gas supplies to Europe.

articles.title: Shawn Mendes cancels Toronto 'Wonder' tour dates | CTV News - CTV News Toronto
articles.description: Singer Shawn Mendes will no longer be playing at Scotiabank Arena in Toronto this weekend after he announced on Thursday that he would be cancelling the rest of his North American and European tour.
